remarks: The beginning of the proof that every II-finite set (every chain of subsets has a maximal element) is III-finite (has no denumerable collection of subsets). This first section is dedicated to the construction of ` U ` and its intersection.  First, the value of ` U ` at a successor.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Nov-2014.)
